com.example.nerdherd.ObjectManager

Class ProfileManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.nerdherd.ObjectManager.ProfileManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DatabaseListener

    public class ProfileManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements DatabaseListener
    Singleton class that manages all Profiles Potentially overkill as we only deal with our own profile But too late to take out now.
